name: ODISHA STARTUP CLUB
briefDescription: Founded in the year 2015, Odisha Startup Club (OSC) is a non-profit organisation working passionately for the development of start-up ecosystem in Odisha, India. Serving as a community for budding entrepreneurs, the club provides a common platform for like-minded start-up professionals to interact, discuss and learn from the experiences of the established entrepreneurs. Having the vision, “We support your idea of making a job than running after one”, OSC facilitates right exposure to the aspiring as well as early stage start-ups without any intimidation.
